name: Sequestrion Archives
description:
!!Warning - Read this first!!

Please be advised that this Visual Novel does not reflect my personal opinions, nor do I endorse the messages in this VN.

Content warnings for:

Self-harm mention, gun usage, xenophobia, transphobia, death threats
[Please inform me if I have missed any]

=====

You are walking into a terrible, terrible fate.

=====

Sequestrion Archives is the prequel to Sequestrion, following the stories of Smokescreen, a small team of resistance against surveillance.

~~~~~

This is my second VN made using Ren'Py!

Credits for all images / music / sound effects used are listed here, please check out these creators!
